column1: S0122.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S0122.DECK.  122. SURVEY NUMBER
S0122.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
S0122.Q1. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN STATIONED IN THE BRITISH ISLES?  1. LESS THAN 6 MONTHS 2. 6 MONTHS TO A YEAR 3. 1 YEAR TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER 2 YEARS 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0122.Q2. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED 3. WIDOWED 4. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0122.Q3. CHECK THE ANSWER THAT TELLS BEST HOW FAR YOU WENT IN SCHOOL.  1. DID NOT FINISH GRADE SCHOOL 2. FINISHED GRADE SCHOOL 3. HAD SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT GRADUATE 4. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 5. HAD SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT GRADUATE 6. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 7. NO ANSWER
S0122.Q4. WHAT SORT OF OPINION DO YOU HAVE OF THE ENGLISH PEOPLE?  1. VERY FAVORABLE 2. FAIRLY FAVORABLE 3. RATHER UNFAVORABLE 4. VERY UNFAVORABLE 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0122.Q5A. HAS YOUR OPINION OF THE ENGLISH PEOPLE CHANGED FROM WHAT IT WAS BEFORE YOU CAME TO ENGLAND?  1. IT IS MUCH HIGHER THAN IT WAS 2. IT IS SOMEWHAT HIGHER THAN IT WAS 3. IT HAS NOT CHANGED ONE WAY OR THE OTHER 4. IT IS A BIT LOWER THAN IT WAS 5. IT IS MUCH LOWER THAN IT WAS 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0122.Q5B. IF IT HAS CHANGED WHAT DO YOU THINK CAUSED IT TO CHANGE?  01. CLOSER ACQUAINTANCE 02. FAVORABLE COMMENTS ON FRIENDLINESS, HOSPITALITY, ETC. 03. ATTITUDE TOWARD AMERICAN SOLDIERS OR TREATMENT OF AMERICAN SOLDIERS 04. CONDESCENDING, CONCEITED, SMUG, SNOOTY OR ETC. 05. THEIR STANDARD OF LIVING 06. UNFAVORABLE COMMENTS ON MORALS OF ENGLISH PEOPLE 07. THEIR SYSTEM OF CLASS DISCRIMINATION 08. ENGLISH PEOPLE'S PART IN THE WAR 09. NO ANSWER TO Q.5B 10. AMERICAN SOLDIERS, CONDUCT OF AMERICAN SOLDIERS 11. MISCELLANEOUS 12. "THE WAR" WITHOUT FURTHER EXPLANATION

S0122.Q6. GENERALLY SPEAKING, WHAT SORT OF OPINION DO YOU THINK MOST ENGLISH PEOPLE HAVE OF AMERICAN SOLDIERS?  1. VERY FAVORABLE 2. FAIRLY FAVORABLE 3. RATHER UNFAVORABLE 4. VERY UNFAVORABLE 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0122.Q7. WHAT SORT OF OPINION DID YOU HAVE OF ENGLISH PEOPLE BEFORE YOU CAME TO ENGLAND?  1. VERY FAVORABLE 2. FAIRLY FAVORABLE 3. RATHER UNFAVORABLE 4. VERY UNFAVORABLE 5. NO ANSWER
S0122.Q8A. HOW MANY ENGLISH FAMILIES HAVE YOU GOTTEN TO KNOW?  1. NONE 2. ONE OR TWO 3. SEVERAL 4. A FAIRLY LARGE NUMBER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0122.Q8B. HOW MANY ENGLISH MEN IN THE ARMED FORCES?  1. NONE 2. ONE OR TWO 3. SEVERAL 4. A FAIRLY LARGE NUMBER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0122.Q8C. HOW MANY ENGLISH GIRLS IN THE ARMED FORCES?  1. NONE 2. ONE OR TWO 3. SEVERAL 4. A FAIRLY LARGE NUMBER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0122.Q8D. HOW MANY ENGLISH CIVILIAN GIRLS?  1. NONE 2. ONE OR TWO 3. SEVERAL 4. A FAIRLY LARGE NUMBER 5. NO ANSWER
S0122.Q8E. HOW MANY ENGLISH CIVILIANS (OLDER MEN AND WOMEN)*  1. NONE 2. ONE OR TWO 3. SEVERAL 4. A FAIRLY LARGE NUMBER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0122.Q9A. IN GENERAL, WHAT IS YOUR OPINION OF THE ENGLISH FAMILIES YOU HAVE MET?  1. HAVEN'T MET ANY 2. THEY ARE PRETTY MUCH THE SAME AS FAMILIES AT HOME 3. THEY ARE VERY DIFFERENT FROM FAMILIES AT HOME 4. NO ANSWER

S0122.Q9B. WHAT IS YOUR OPINION OF THE ENGLISH SOLDIERS YOU HAVE MET?  01. HAVEN'T MET ANY 02. THEY ARE PRETTY MUCH THE SAME, ETC. 03. NO COMMENTS WRITTEN IN AND "THEY'RE VERY DIFFERENT" CHECKED 04. RESERVED, SOBER, SERIOUS, MATURE, LESS BOASTFUL, ETC. 05. MORE MILITARY, MORE STRICTLY OR EASILY DISCIPLINED 06. UNFRIENDLY, SUPERIOR ATTITUDE 07. JEALOUS OF AMERICAN SOLDIERS, OR ENVIOUS, OR DISLIKING AMERICANS 08. COCKY, SELF-CENTERED, BRAGGING, EGOCENTRIC 09. NO ANSWER AT ALL BY CHECK OR COMMENT 10. FAVORABLE COMMENTS 11. MISCELLANEOUS

S0122.Q9C. WHAT IS YOUR OPINION OF THE ENGLISH GIRLS YOU HAVE MET?  01. HAVEN'T MET ANY 02. THEY ARE PRETTY MUCH THE SAME 03. NO COMMENT WRITTEN IN 04. SERIOUS, RESERVED, MATURE 05. UNFRIENDLY, CONDECENDING, SUPERIOR ATTITUDE 06. IMMORAL, PROMISCUOUS 07. FRIENDLY, SOCIABLE, CONGENIAL 08. LESS INTELLIGENT, LESS EDUCATED, IGNORANT, SLOW IN UNDERSTANDING 09. NO ANSWER AT ALL BY CHECK OR COMMENT 10. SHY, BASHFUL 11. MISCELLANEOUS 12. IMMATURE, EASILY LED, UNSOPHISTICATED, DEPENDENT, "BELIEVE ANYTHING YOU SAY"

S0122.Q9D. WHAT IS YOUR OPINION OF THE OLDER ENGLISH WOMEN YOU HAVE MET?  1. HAVEN'T MET ANY 2. THEY ARE PRETTY MUCH THE SAME AS OLDER WOMEN AT HOME 3. THEY ARE VERY DIFFERENT FROM OLDER WOMEN AT HOME 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0122.Q9E. WHAT IS YOUR OPINION OF THE ENGLISH WORKING MEN YOU HAVE MET?  1. HAVEN'T MET ANY 2. THEY ARE PRETTY MUCH LIKE THE WORKING MEN IN THE UNITED STATES 3. THEY ARE VERY DIFFERENT FROM WORKING MEN IN THE STATES 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0122.Q10. HOW DID YOU FIRST MEET MOST OF THE ENGLISH PEOPLE YOU KNOW?  1. USUALLY JUST GOT ACQUAINTED WITH THEM MYSELF ON A CHANCE MEETING 2. MET MOST OF THEM THROUGH A FRIEND WHO ALREADY KNEW THEM 3. MET MOST OF THEM BY INVITATION THROUGH ONE OF THE SERVICE ORGANIZATIONS 4. SOME OTHER WAY 5. NO ANSWER

S0122.Q11. WHERE DID YOU FIRST MEET MOST OF THE ENGLISH PEOPLE YOU KNOW?  1. JUST MET THEM AROUND TOWN 2. MET MOST OF THEM AT THEIR HOMES 3. MET MOST OF THEM AT DANCES 4. MET MOST OF THEM AT AN EATING PLACE OR PUB 5. SOME OTHER PLACE 6. NO ANSWER
S0122.Q12. AS A WHOLE WHAT SORT OF A JOB DO YOU THINK THE ENGLISH PEOPLE HAVE BEEN DOING TOWARD THE WAR EFFORT?  1. VERY GOOD 2. FAIRLY GOOD 3. NOT VERY GOOD 4. NO ANSWER
S0122.Q13. IN GENERAL, HOW WELL DO YOU THINK THE BRITISH SOLDIER STACKS UP AS A FIGHTING MAN?  1. VERY WELL 2. FAIRLY WELL 3. NOT VERY WELL 4. NOT WELL AT ALL 5. NO ANSWER

S0122.Q14. HOW IMPORTANT DO YOU THINK IT IS TO THE FUTURE WELL-BEING OF THE UNITED STATES THAT AMERICAN SOLDIERS GET ALONG WELL WITH THE ENGLISH PEOPLE?  1. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 2. SOMEWHAT IMPORTANT 3. QUITE IMPORTANT 4. VERY IMPORTANT 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0122.Q15. IF YOU HAVE ANY FURTHER REMARKS TO MAKE ON THIS SUBJECT, PLEASE WRITE THEM BELOW:  1. COMMENTS 2. NO COMMENTS 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0122.V16. ATTITUDE TOWARD BRITISH E. DERIVED FROM QUESTIONS 4, 5 AND 7.  1. INCREASINGLY FAVORABLE 2. CONSTANTLY FAVORABLE 3. DECREASINGLY FAVORABLE 4. CONVERSION TO FAVORABLE 5. DECREASINGLY UNFAVORABLE 6. CONSTANTLY UNFAVORABLE 7. INCREASINGLY UNFAVORABLE 8. CONVERSION TO UNFAVORABLE 9. INCONSISTENT OR UNDETERMINABLE GROUP 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0122.V17. SERIAL NUMBER X. CODES NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION. DATA TRANSFERRED AS IS.  ANP 0000.NO CODE OR NO DATA
